text: wasalwh 'ana yaghfir lakum dhnwbkm, thuma arjieuu 'iilayh nadimin ymtekm fi dnyakm mtaeana hsnana bialhayat altayibat fyha, 'iilaa 'ana yahin ajlkm, wyuet kula dhi fadl min eilm waeamil jaza'an fadlah kamilaan la naqs fyh, wa'iin taearaduu emma 'adeukum 'iilayh fa'iiniy 'akhshaa ealaykum eadhab yawm shdyd, wahu yawm alqyam. whdha tahdid shadid liman twlla ean 'awamir allah taealaa wkdhdhab rslh
